articles.author: Emily Sanderson
articles.title: Jury finds Richard Allen guilty on all counts in Delphi murders trial - WLWT Cincinnati
articles.description: Richard Allen, the man accused of killing two teenagers in Delphi, Indiana in 2017, has been found guilty on all four counts.
articles.content:
DELPHI, Ind. —Richard Allen, the man accused of killing two teenagers in Delphi, Indiana in 2017, has been found guilty on all four counts.
